prompts.prompt:
create marks calculator in this there is a input box of subject name/final marks (out of 100)/internal marks (out of 25)/midterm mark (out of 50) and there is button of add subject and remove too , 

here's breakdown to calculate to pass and grade one:

mid sem marks convert into 25
end sem marks convert into 50
internal marks remain same as 25

after that if marks;
less than 40 then fail (f grade)
40: p grade
41-50: D grade
51-60: C grade
61-70: B grade
71-80: A grade
81-100: O grade
the text box text in white so not visible make it black
make some style using tailwandcss components of input box also label that too
after updated to style the input box text become white so its invisible so make it black that
